QuestData.Title: Knee-Deep
QuestData.Description: It's time to pack it in, $n. Most of our people have made it through -- it's your turn now.$B$BTake this torch, you're going to need it. The tunnel is full of nasty, knee-biting critters of the worst kind. Use it to keep them at bay.$B$BSpeak to Krennan on the other side.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Half-Burnt Torch to get to the other side of the tunnel beneath Gilneas City.
QuestData.RewardText: You're here, $n. Most everyone made it through, but now we're stuck here... surrounded by our own... dead!
